title: The block of salt must be from Riot Games.
body:
The 5th item is pretentious, especially if it's made by Riot Games. Wouldn't be surprised those block of salt was made from the salty raging LoL players. Since all those minerals could only be harvest by human rage and high blood pressure. That's why it's red. Blood, sweat, and tears. 

https://www.youtube.com/embed/H0q9yxE4IKg?start=624

replies.body: This makes more sense than most of the crap posted on the boards lately, at least.
